text: xun ca kxallxhˌ kranan hrux thi chan ca sæwngha phu chikhad thang «thi phraxngkh pen phuthrng prathan khamphir lng ma kæ phwk than nı sphaph thi thuk cækcæng wi xyang laxeiyd læa br rda phu thi rea di hı khamphir kæ phwk khea nan phwk khea ru di wa thæ cring xalkurxan nan thuk prathan lng ma cak phracea khxng cea dwy khwam pen cring cea xya di xyu nı hmu phu sngsay penxankhad
